name: dependency-injection
description: A lightweight, extensible dependency injection container for JavaScript.

classes.name: Container
classes.description: A lightweight, extensible dependency injection container.

methods.description: Add support for AtScript RTTI according to spec at http://www.atscript.org
methods.name: useAtScript

methods.description: Adds an additional location to search for constructor parameter type info.
methods.name: addParameterInfoLocator

params.name: locator
params.description: Configures a locator function to use when searching for parameter info. It should return undefined if no parameter info is found.

methods.description: Registers an existing object instance with the container.
methods.name: registerInstance

params.name: key
params.description: The key that identifies the dependency at resolution time; usually a constructor function.

params.name: instance
params.description: The instance that will be resolved when the key is matched.

methods.description: Registers a type (constructor function) such that the container returns a new instance for each request.
methods.name: registerTransient

params.name: key
params.description: The key that identifies the dependency at resolution time; usually a constructor function.

params.name: fn
params.description: The constructor function to use when the dependency needs to be instantiated.

methods.description: Registers a type (constructor function) such that the container always returns the same instance for each request.
methods.name: registerSingleton

params.name: key
params.description: The key that identifies the dependency at resolution time; usually a constructor function.

params.name: fn
params.description: The constructor function to use when the dependency needs to be instantiated.

methods.description: Registers a type (constructor function) by inspecting its registration annotations. If none are found, then the default singleton registration is used.
methods.name: autoRegister

params.name: fn
params.description: The constructor function to use when the dependency needs to be instantiated.

params.name: key
params.description: The key that identifies the dependency at resolution time; usually a constructor function.

methods.description: Registers an array of types (constructor functions) by inspecting their registration annotations. If none are found, then the default singleton registration is used.
methods.name: autoRegisterAll

params.name: fns
params.description: The constructor function to use when the dependency needs to be instantiated.

methods.description: Registers a custom resolution function such that the container calls this function for each request to obtain the instance.
methods.name: registerHandler

params.name: key
params.description: The key that identifies the dependency at resolution time; usually a constructor function.

params.name: handler
params.description: The resolution function to use when the dependency is needed. It will be passed one arguement, the container instance that is invoking it.

methods.description: Resolves a single instance based on the provided key.
methods.name: get

params.name: key
params.description: The key that identifies the object to resolve.

methods.description: Resolves all instance registered under the provided key.
methods.name: getAll

params.name: key
params.description: The key that identifies the objects to resolve.

return.description: Returns an array of the resolved instances.

methods.description: Inspects the container to determine if a particular key has been registred.
methods.name: hasHandler

params.name: key
params.description: The key that identifies the dependency at resolution time; usually a constructor function.

params.name: checkParent
params.description: Indicates whether or not to check the parent container hierarchy.

return.description: Returns true if the key has been registred; false otherwise.

methods.description: Creates a new dependency injection container whose parent is the current container.
methods.name: createChild

return.description: Returns a new container instance parented to this.

methods.description: Invokes a function, recursively resolving its dependencies.
methods.name: invoke

params.name: fn
params.description: The function to invoke with the auto-resolved dependencies.

return.description: Returns the instance resulting from calling the function.

classes.name: Registration
classes.description: An abstract annotation used to allow functions/classes to indicate how they should be registered with the container.

methods.description: Called by the container to allow custom registration logic for the annotated function/class.
methods.name: register

params.name: container
params.description: The container to register with.

params.name: key
params.description: The key to register as.

params.name: fn
params.description: The function to register (target of the annotation).

classes.name: Transient
classes.description: An annotation used to allow functions/classes to indicate that they should be registered as transients with the container.

params.name: key
params.description: The key to register as.

methods.description: Called by the container to register the annotated function/class as transient.
methods.name: register

params.name: container
params.description: The container to register with.

params.name: key
params.description: The key to register as.

params.name: fn
params.description: The function to register (target of the annotation).

classes.name: Singleton
classes.description: An annotation used to allow functions/classes to indicate that they should be registered as singletons with the container.

params.name: key
params.description: The key to register as.

methods.description: Called by the container to register the annotated function/class as a singleton.
methods.name: register

params.name: container
params.description: The container to register with.

params.name: key
params.description: The key to register as.

params.name: fn
params.description: The function to register (target of the annotation).

classes.name: Resolver
classes.description: An abstract annotation used to allow functions/classes to specify custom dependency resolution logic.

methods.description: Called by the container to allow custom resolution of dependencies for a function/class.
methods.name: get

params.name: container
params.description: The container to resolve from.

classes.name: Lazy
classes.description: An annotation used to allow functions/classes to specify lazy resolution logic.

params.name: key
params.description: The key to lazily resolve.

methods.description: Called by the container to lazily resolve the dependency into a lazy locator function.
methods.name: get

params.name: container
params.description: The container to resolve from.

return.description: Returns a function which can be invoked at a later time to obtain the actual dependency.

methods.description: Creates a Lazy Resolver for the supplied key.
methods.name: of

params.name: key
params.description: The key to lazily resolve.

return.description: Returns an insance of Lazy for the key.

classes.name: All
classes.description: An annotation used to allow functions/classes to specify resolution of all matches to a key.

params.name: key
params.description: The key to lazily resolve all matches for.

methods.description: Called by the container to resolve all matching dependencies as an array of instances.
methods.name: get

params.name: container
params.description: The container to resolve from.

return.description: Returns an array of all matching instances.

methods.description: Creates an All Resolver for the supplied key.
methods.name: of

params.name: key
params.description: The key to resolve all instances for.

return.description: Returns an insance of All for the key.

classes.name: Optional
classes.description: An annotation used to allow functions/classes to specify an optional dependency, which will be resolved only if already registred with the container.

params.name: key
params.description: The key to optionally resolve for.

params.name: checkParent
params.description: Indicates whether or not the parent container hierarchy should be checked.

methods.description: Called by the container to provide optional resolution of the key.
methods.name: get

params.name: container
params.description: The container to resolve from.

return.description: Returns the instance if found; otherwise null.

methods.description: Creates an Optional Resolver for the supplied key.
methods.name: of

params.name: key
params.description: The key to optionally resolve for.

params.name: checkParent
params.description: Indicates whether or not the parent container hierarchy should be checked.

return.description: Returns an insance of Optional for the key.

classes.name: Parent
classes.description: An annotation used to inject the dependency from the parent container instead of the current one.

params.name: key
params.description: The key to resolve from the parent container.

methods.description: Called by the container to load the dependency from the parent container
methods.name: get

params.name: container
params.description: The container to resolve the parent from.

return.description: Returns the matching instance from the parent container

methods.description: Creates a Parent Resolver for the supplied key.
methods.name: of

params.name: key
params.description: The key to resolve.

return.description: Returns an insance of Parent for the key.
